summary: Loading screen but in black and white.
descriptionHtml:
What does it do :
This mod makes the loading screens black and white.

Why :
Because I think it looks classy

How :
Black and White magic

Were :
Wolf

What is love :
A chemical reaction

You are insane :
Yes , but I felt that black and white loadings looked like a lot of promotional art for the game.

Its 2016 why are you not playing fallout? :
I do, but skyrim calls , no one leaves skyrim until TES6... them are da rules , yo !

Why still play skyrim? :
Tamriel
author: C0331 AKA Privata
